data.title: Connie Booth
data.text:
AKA Constance Booth

Born: 1944

Birthplace: Indianapolis, IN

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Polly Shearman on Fawlty Towers

Husband: John Cleese (actor, m. 20-Feb-1968, div. 1978, one daughter)

Daughter: Cynthia Cleese (b. 1971)

Husband: John Lahr (son of Bert Lahr, drama critic)

TELEVISION

Fawlty Towers Polly Shearman (1975-79)

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

The Buccaneers (5-Feb-1995)

Leon the Pig Farmer (26-Feb-1993)

American Friends (22-Mar-1991) Â· Miss Caroline Hartley

High Spirits (18-Nov-1988)

Hawks (10-Sep-1988)

84 Charing Cross Road (13-Feb-1987)

Past Caring (1985)

The Hound of the Baskervilles (3-Nov-1983)

Deadly Game (1982)

Little Lord Fauntleroy (25-Nov-1980)

Why Didn't They Ask Evans? (30-Mar-1980)

The Strange Case of the End of Civilization as We Know It (18-Sep-1977)

Monty Python and the Holy Grail (3-Apr-1975)

Romance with a Double Bass (1974)

And Now for Something Completely Different (22-Aug-1972)

How To Irritate People (1968)
